documents.document:
Santouryu Sessions on RADIO FREQUENCY 88.1FM (Fridays 1-3am)

SANTOURYU SESSIONS [Radio Frequency 88.1FM]
Fridays 1-3am

Ez all, anyone into Drum and Bass [particularly dark dn should get locked into our show tomorrow night 1-3am.

If your in the Leeds area, dial ya wireless into 88.1fm
or log on at www.leedsdrumandbass.co.uk

Shadowy business.

- Boya

DnB on ALL FM tommorrow night

Easy all, get locked onto 98.9FM (Manchester) or www.allfm.org Wednesday nights 11-1 for the PSI Drum and Bass Show

PSI takes you through the first hour offering up the latest releases and promo's.

Once we hit midnight the pace gets upped with me and Redeye getting straight into the mix with some weighty classics and some steaming dubs fresh off the press. Coupled with The Base Invaders, Backchat and Mitch on mic duties, this is a serving of Beats, Bass and Verse not too be missed.

Get it bookmarked and get it locked!

All Fm 11-1: PSI SHOW w. Boya n Redeye

Easy all, get locked onto 98.9FM (Manchester) or www.allfm.org Wednesday nights 11-1 for the PSI Drum and Bass Show

PSI takes you through the first hour offering up the latest releases and promo's.

Once we hit midnight the pace gets upped with me and Redeye getting straight into the mix with some weighty classics and some steaming dubs fresh off the press. Coupled with The Base Invaders, Backchat and Mitch on mic duties, this is a serving of Beats, Bass and Verse not to be missed.

Get it bookmarked and get it locked!

ALL FM DNB LIVE NOW!

Rollin the old n new sounds live from manchester, the all fm kru keepin it weighty.

Get it locked!

DJ's: PSI
Boya
Redeye

MC's: The Base Invaders, Backchat

www.allfm.org

96.9FM (Manchester)

The Last Alliance Radio on NWDNB TONIGHT 6-7

Yes ppl our debut show kicks off tonight at 6 and will be every 2nd & last thursday of the month so i want all you dark/tech/neurofunk lovers locked on. Its gettin dark outside but even darker in the studio as myself, Lauy and El roll out the murky tunes for yu's lot...

Listen here: http://www.nwdnb.co.uk/audio/radio.asp

1 Xtra Bass Competition Mix ’07: Boya

Heres my entry for the 30 min comp....

1 Xtra Bass Competition Mix ’07: Boya

Destroyed – Audio (Freak)
>> Hornet - Bad Company (BC)
Mind Speed - Kryptic Minds & Leon Switch (Defcom)
Vault - Pendulum (31 Recs)
Now! - Phace (Subtitles)
Screw Up - Ewun (Lifted Music)
Motion Design - Break (Levitated)
Surface Noise - Fierce & DJ Optiv (Quarantine)
My Generation - Audio (Habit)
Free Fall - Prolix (Ganja-Tek)
Mind Killa - Shimon & Andy C (Ram)
Dub Room - Benny Page (Cutterz Choice)
No Soul - Audio (Habit)

http://www.sendspace.com/file/wcf86j

As usual all comments good or bad are appreciated!

1 Xtra Bass Competition Mix ’07: Boya

Heres my entry for the 30 min comp....

Hope you all enjoy!

The Last Alliance Radio on NWDNB Tomorrow 5-7

Ez ppl, we roll out the dark dnb vibes tommorrow night with a newly extended slot..

An hour just isnt enough time to showcase the murky tunes we have for you lot. Get locked and enjoy!

listen here : www.nwdnb.co.uk/audio/radio.asp

get in the chatroom (link at bottom of radio page) for shoutouts/requests

safe

The Last Alliance Radio rolling now!

lock on at www.nwdnb.co.uk/audio/radio.asp

Dark Dnb shizzle a'gwarn!

The Last Alliance 15/02/07 @ Scubar (Manchester)

DJ’s:

Boya (TLA)
Lauy (TLA)
El (TLA)
Foo B2B Davieez (Parallel Beatz)
Mr P (Hip-Hop set)

MC’s:

The Base Invaders (Eddie P & Frisko), Mitch MC [Hectic Harmoniz]

Additional Info:

After an extended break over the holiday period, The Last Alliance returns to assault your senses once more with the murky, nasty side of drum and bass.

This month we bring you a resident’s special. Joining us will be up & coming Neuro-Funkster’s, Foo & Davieez as well as hip-hop specialist Mr P, (Ian P) show-casing his turn-table wizardry. (watch this space for links to mixes and an extended profile)

Those who have managed to get down to our previous nights will know that there are no frills, we just know how to throw a bloomin’ good paaaaarty!

Saturday Sessions on Unity Radio (18:00-20:00)

Tonight we have a very special pre-Last Alliance warm up for y'all.

Expect the usual dark, rolling murkyness from myself +

Special Guests:

Foo & Davieez

Induc3d

lock on here: www.unityradio.co.uk

The Last Alliance Radio Live NOW!

TONIGHT:

BOYA AND LAUY

tonight im gonna be bringin u a bit of a ram special with tunes old and new from this epic label, as well as the murkiest selction from other labels, in preparation for Rams 15th Bday Special (Valve Soundsystem).

get locked and in the chatroom here... www.nwdnb.co.uk/audio/radio.asp

The Last Alliance @ Scubar (manchester): TONIGHT!!!

Stuck for summat to do tonight? fancy a rave? Look no further than The Last Alliance @ Scubar (Manchester).

Dark rolling DnB and nice friendly party vibes...

The Last Alliance Vs D. Fazed @ Scubar (Manchester)

Event: The Last Alliance Vs D. Fazed @ Scubar (Manchester)
Date: Thu 22/03/07 - 9pm - late

DJs:
Boya B2B Lauy (Last Alliance)
Induc3d B2B Sicnote (D. Fazed)
El (Last Alliance)
VKO B2B Chris. Jam (D. Fazed)
Mr P B2B Mr Jims (Hip-Hop Set)

MCs: The Base Invaders [Frisko & Eddie P (Hectic Harmoniz)], Sense MC (Mobbstar)

Entry: £3 b4 11 / £4 after

More Information: We step up our affront on the NW's up and coming scene this month and join forces with the Dark-side masters, D. Fazed

Expect nothing less than the nastiest cuts and the murkiest beats from Scubar's Resident dark-side nights.

Expect plenty of Audio-esque tunes as we provide you with the perfect warm-up to Re:mission.

Santouryu Sessions on Unity Radio: LIVE NOW

We're live now ppl rollin' thru till 8

Lock on at www.unityradio.co.uk for pure unadulterated Dark DnB

BOYA
EL
INDUC3D

dilemma....

In the middle of shaving my head and my clippers run out of charge... rubbish!

updated profile

Ez all, check out my updated myspaz profile now including Streaming DnB mixes by myself.

Feel free to stop by and lemme know whatca think

www.myspace.com/djboya

Safe

Boya
